text: Farallon virus is a strain of Hughes orthonairovirus in the genus OrthonairovirusICTV 7th Report van Regenmortel, M.H.V., Fauquet, C.M., Bishop, D.H.L., Carstens, E.B., Estes, M.K., Lemon, S.M., Maniloff, J., Mayo, M.A., McGeoch, D.J., Pringle, C.R. and Wickner, R.B. (2000). Virus taxonomy. Seventh report of the International Committee on Taxonomy of Viruses. Academic Press, San Diego. p613 https://talk.ictvonline.org/ictv/proposals/ICTV%207th%20Report.pdf belonging to the Hughes serogroup. A known host of the virus is Ornithodoros. The virus is named after the Farallon Islands. ==References== Category:Nairoviridae Category:Infraspecific virus taxa
title: Farallon virus
